articles.author: Seema Mody
articles.title: Embattled Adani Group receives a vote of confidence from U.S. asset manager - CNBC
articles.description: Rajiv Jain is the co-founder and CIO of GQG Partners and is best known for investing in stable growing companies in the tobacco and energy sectors.
articles.content:
Chairperson of Indian conglomerate Adani Group, Gautam Adani, speaks at the World Congress of Accountants in Mumbai on November 19, 2022.

articles.title: Zoom Fires Its President Days After Company Cut 1,300 Jobs - NDTV
articles.description: Zoom laid off 1,300 employees or 15 per cent of its workforce in February this year.
articles.content:
Greg Tomb joined Zoom in June 2022.
Video conferencing platform Zoom has fired its President Greg Tomb, according to a report in the BBC, which cited a regulatory filing by the company. Mr Tomb's co… [+2316 chars]
